name: You See, You Do
description:
WARNING: THIS GAME IS HEAVILY UNPOLISHED, MIGHT FEEL INCOMPLETE! 

But, it does something that many video games don't, so I think it's worth to be shared. I hope you are inspired! Enjoy the experience!

MUSIC BY THE SUPER COOL ROLY! Check out one of his proejct's here: https://www.facebook.com/Earthborne-108542214145468

You see, you do. 
Jump about as a monkey! Yes, the game might crash if you hit your head on ceilings, so try to move around, then once the monkey's arms are extended, grab on!
It's faster to jump, but you can still walk around.

There's FIVE LEVELS! (Excluding the first introductory one!)
Then THAT'S IT!
Feel free to make the game easier for yourself in any way you like, to compensate for difficulty or crashes!

Enjoy!
